name: Depot
body: ##E-commerce Web App Depot is a business to consumer e-commerce application built based on Agile Web Development (4th edition). The application is live on dp-pragmatic.herokuapp.com. Please clone the repository to see the admin view of the application. ##Create a Local Copy of the Repo Step 1: Click the 'Fork' button on the top right on your screen. That will create a copy of the repo under your Github username. Step 2: In your commandline/ terminal run ```bash $ git clone GIT CLONE URL ``` GIT CLONE URL = https://github.com/INSERT YOUR USERNAME/Twitter.git or you can copy the "HTTP CLONE url" Step 3: Run the following commands to install the necessary gems ```bash $ bundle install ``` to migrate the database (This reporitory use Rails 4.1.1 if you are using older version migrate the test environment): ```bash $ rake db:migrate ``` to execute the lib task sample data ```bash $ rake db:seed ``` Note:Seed will create an Admin user for the admin tools demo. to run project in a locally ```bash $ rails s
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
